org.jtransfo

Interface ClassReplacer


  • public interface ClassReplacer
    Allow classes to be replaced before being used for conversion. This can be useful to swap interfaces interfaces to real objects in domain mappings. This is applied to the class specified in DomainClass annotations and to the target class in JTransfo.convertTo(Object, Class, String...).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class replaceClass(Class clazz)
      Convert a class to a different class.

    • Method Detail

      • replaceClass

        Class replaceClass(Class clazz)
        Convert a class to a different class. To make sure this can work, classes should only be converted to child classes. If the class is not replaced, the class itself should be returned.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class which may need to be replaced
        Returns:
        replacement class or the class itself
